details.title: Performance of Manchester Coded FSK
details.abstract: Manchester coded FSK uses two shifts per message bit. Assuming each shift is an incoherent RF pulse, we show that for small p2, the input signal-to-noise ratio, a quadratic receiver is optimum and has Pe=Â¿(1+p2/4) exp(-p2/4). By comparison, incoherent FSK has Pe=Â¿exp(-p2/4).
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
